paper_abstract: M vertical bar p(m) - 1, we derive linear complexity over the prime field F(p), of M-ary Sidel'nikov sequences of period p(m)-1 using discrete Fourier transform. As a special case, the linear complexity of the ternary Sidel'nikov sequence is presented. It turns out that the linear complexity of a ternary Sidel'nikov sequence with the symbol k(0) not equal 1 at the (p(m) - 1)/2-th position is nearly close to the period of the sequence, while that with k(0) = 1 shows much lower value.
paper_title: Linear complexity over F(p) of ternary Sidel'nikov sequences
